'''Tuna Sushi''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Tuna Sushi is obtainable from [[Kiminami Anna]] at [[Kiminami Restaurant]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Tuna Sushi restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
